CompanyName.label: Company Name
CompanyName.value: Signing Day Sports, Inc. Common Stock

Address.label: Address
Address.value: 8355 EAST HARTFORD ROAD,SUITE 100, SCOTTSDALE, Arizona, 85255, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: Signing Day Sports, Inc., a technology company, engages in developing and operating platforms to give student-athletes the opportunity to go to college and continue playing sports. The company offers Signing Day Sports, a sports recruitment platform that help athletes get discovered and recruited by coaches and recruiters across the country. Its technology platform serves student-athletes and their parents, high school and sports club coaches, and college and professional recruiters and scouts. Signing Day Sports, Inc. was incorporated in 2020 and is based in Scottsdale, Arizona.
